properties.name: driver.driver-attribute
properties.description:
driver attribute list

- displayName: attribute display name

- name: attribute name

- type: string/int/double/float/long/boolean

- value: default value

- description: description.

properties.name: driver.point-attribute
properties.description:
device point attribute list

- displayName: attribute display name

- name: attribute name

- type: string/int/double/float/long/boolean

- value: default value

- description: description.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.keep-alive
properties.description: driver keep alive interval for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.completion-timeout
properties.description: driver completion timeout for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.qos
properties.description: driver qos(int list) for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.topics
properties.description: driver topics(string list) for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.client.id
properties.description: driver client id for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.default.qos
properties.description: driver default qos for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.default.topic
properties.description: driver default topic for mqtt server.

properties.name: driver.mqtt.default.receive.enable
properties.description: driver default topic receive enable for mqtt server.
